search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Crowdcast (crowdcast.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official Crowdcast pricing page is available at https://www.crowdcast.io/pricing .

extracted_content.content:
Pricing
===============

[](https://www.crowdcast.io/)

[Product](https://www.crowdcast.io/product)[Customers](https://www.crowdcast.io/customers)[Discover](https://www.crowdcast.io/discover)Learn

[What's new](https://www.crowdcast.io/updates)[Office hours](https://crowdcast.io/@crowdcast)[Docs](https://docs.crowdcast.io/)[Blog](https://crowdcast.io/blog)[Company](https://www.crowdcast.io/about)[Community](https://crowdcast.link/v2-community)

[Pricing](https://www.crowdcast.io/pricing)

[Book Demo](https://crowdcast.link/schedule)[Sign In](https://www.crowdcast.io/sign-in)[Sign Up](https://www.crowdcast.io/sign-up)

Simple Pricing
--------------

MonthlyAnnualSAVE 30%

lite
----

For creators and small businesses looking to grow their audience

$49

/mo

Live attendees

100+

Live attendees are users who show up live during the event. You can have unlimited users register for your event, you only pay for those who show up live. You’ll be charged 15¢ per extra live attendee after your plan's attendee limit. Need a custom plan? Schedule a demo below.

Hours per month

10

Stream for up to 10 hours per month. Add extra hours as needed if you use up all the hours in a month — $20 per extra 5 hrs.

Host seats

1

Teammates added to your channel are able to manage and produce your events. Add more seats for $29/seat.

[Select plan](https://crowdcast.io/sign-up?sign_up_for_trial=true)

All base features included

*   Transaction fee: 5%
    
    Charge a ticket price for your events. Choose a fixed price or sliding. Create coupons to give discounts. For every ticket sold there is a 5% transaction fee plus Stripe's [processing fee](https://stripe.com/us/pricing) of 2.9% + 30¢.
    
*   2 hour sessions
    
    Stream up to 2 hours in a session. You can add unlimited number of sessions to an event.
    
*   HD Live video with recording
    
    Your event has the option to be recorded and the recording will be available instantly for replay and download.
    
*   Multi-session events
    
    Create events that have multiple sessions at different times. This is great for creating live courses or online summits. [Click here](https://www.crowdcast.io/courses) to learn more about live courses on crowdcast.
    
*   RTMP Mode - Broadcast from OBS, Wirecast, Ecamm Live & more
    
    RTMP Mode lets you send HD video from OBS, Wirecast, Ecamm Live and more to your crowdcast.
    
*   Email and chat support
    
    Our general support hours are Monday to Friday, 9am to 5pm (PST, or UTC-8). We will do our best to respond within 24 hours although our actual response times may vary and take longer for more advanced or technical inquiries.
    
*   Stripe Integration
    
    Connect Stripe to your account to accept payment for paid events and in-event contributions.
    
*   Event and Session Analytics
    
    See detailed conversion rates, referral info, performance metrics and engagement metrics about your crowdcast.
    
*   Zapier Integration
    
    Connect to over 1,500 apps and CRM systems through Zapier. [Click here](https://zapier.com/zapbook/) to a list of all the apps we support.
    
*   Export Email Addresses, Chat, Data
    
    Export all emails, chat messages and data from attendees into a CSV.
    

pro
---

For professional creators and businesses to consistently host live video events

$89

/mo

Live attendees

250+

Live attendees are users who show up live during the event. You can have unlimited users register for your event, you only pay for those who show up live. You’ll be charged 15¢ per extra live attendee after your plan's attendee limit. Need a custom plan? Schedule a demo below.

Hours per month

20

Stream for up to 20 hours per month. Add extra hours as needed if you use up all the hours in a month — $20 per extra 5 hrs.

Host seats

2

Teammates added to your channel are able to manage and produce your events. Add more seats for $29/seat.

[Select plan](https://crowdcast.io/sign-up?sign_up_for_trial=true)

All Lite features plus

*   4 hour sessions
    
    Stream up to 4 hours in a session. You can add multiple sessions to an event.
    
*   Multistream to 1 location
    
    [Multistream](https://www.crowdcast.io/multistreams) your crowdcast stage to 3rd party sites like Facebook, Youtube, Twitch & more.
    
*   Custom registration fields
    
    Add custom inputs to the registration form to collect additional data like phone numbers, URLs, multiple choice questions, dates, and more.
    

business
--------

For startups and companies looking to engage their customers

$195

/mo

Live attendees

1000+

Live attendees are users who show up live during the event. You can have unlimited users register for your event, you only pay for those who show up live. You’ll be charged 15¢ per extra live attendee after your plan's attendee limit. Need a custom plan? Schedule a demo below.

Hours per month

40

Stream for up to 40 hours per month. Add extra hours as needed if you use up all the hours in a month — $20 per extra 5 hrs.

Host seats

4

Teammates added to your channel are able to manage and produce your events. Add more seats for $29/seat.

[Select plan](https://crowdcast.io/sign-up?sign_up_for_trial=true)

All Pro features plus

*   6 hour sessions
    
    Stream up to 6 hours in a session. You can add multiple sessions to an event.
    
*   Transaction fee: 2%
    
    Charge a ticket price for your events. Choose a fixed price or sliding. Create coupons to give discounts. For every ticket sold there is a 2% transaction fee plus Stripe's [processing fee](https://stripe.com/us/pricing) of 2.9% + 30¢.
    
*   Multistream to 3 locations
    
    [Multistream](https://www.crowdcast.io/multistreams) your crowdcast stage to 3rd party sites like Facebook, Youtube, Twitch & more.
    

Free trial

Go live for free
----------------

Start a free trial with 10 live attendees & 60 minute sessions with all business features included

Start 2 week free trial

Talk to a human

Get a live demo
---------------

Get 1-1 demo or join a live group Q&A

[Request a demo](https://crowdcast.link/schedule)

Hire an Expert
--------------

Hire a verified Crowdcast Expert to help with a range of tasks from real-time technical support to helping produce, market, and facilitate your online event or conference.

[Meet the experts](https://www.notion.so/2408a4b2132644b39fe6f85b9dbb6e59?v=73305636fe514890a6f73c3737f4edb7)

Frequently asked questions
--------------------------

What is included in the free trial?

During the 14 day free trial, you’ll have access to all features and integrations. Live sessions are limited to 60 minutes and 10 live attendees.

What is considered a "live attendee"?

It's the number of people who show up live. If you have 60 registered users and 25 show up live during the webinar, then you have 25 live attendees. In that case you should be fine on the Lite plan.

What happens when more people attend live than you expected?

You can have unlimited registrants for your event. You only pay for those who show up live. You’ll be charged .15¢ per extra live attendee after reaching your plan’s attendee limit. [Learn more about overage charges here.](https://docs.crowdcast.io/en/articles/7248212-overages-explained)

Can I change plans easily?

Yes, you can upgrade, downgrade, pause, or cancel your plan at any time\*. Click here to [learn more](https://docs.crowdcast.io/en/articles/7248075-upgrading-or-downgrading-your-plan). _\*terms may apply_

What people are saying
----------------------

We use Crowdcast for brand building and community events. I host a Q&A call for our community each month. We also host our virtual conferences on it. Crowdcast is a HUGE time saver. I never build landing pages for events anymore. I never have to upload recordings and send out links anymore. I love the fact that I can always say, "Yes, the event will be recorded. Just return to the exact same URL and it'll be waiting for you." The other benefit is that my audience loves interacting with me on Crowdcast--so there's a relationship-building aspect too. The quality of experience that you can create with Crowdcast is something I find really hard to duplicate elsewhere.

![Image 4: Tara McMullin's testimonial profile photo](https://www.crowdcast.io/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.sanity.io%2Fimages%2F043asqj4%2Fproduction%2Fc1f8434d93a8b9e205c62f4100320de08414b9a2-3000x3000.png&w=256&q=75)

Tara McMullin

Founder of What Works

We tried everything. With free platforms, you're beholden to their standards and practices so if you get kicked off the site you no longer have a show. Crowdcast is easy, interactive, and dependable. Plus, Crowdcast gives us a higher quality relationship with our audience, compared to YouTube or Facebook. With other services we would immediately get harassed by trolls who could access our shows. We don't have to worry about that anymore. And we love that our audience can listen on the mobile app during their commute.

![Image 5: Rod Morrow's testimonial profile photo](https://www.crowdcast.io/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.sanity.io%2Fimages%2F043asqj4%2Fproduction%2F93903e9bec25ba8358d525bbf681c3d0d8c5f412-2860x3000.png&w=256&q=75)

Rod Morrow

The Black Guy Who Tips

See what others are saying

Made with 💗 in GermanyIndonesia

Follow us on [X](https://x.com/CrowdcastHQ), [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/crowdcast.io/?hl=en), & [LinkedIn](https://www.linkedin.com/company/crowdcast-io)

Where the world gathers — Reach, engage, and grow your community with online events.

pricing_data.pricing_notes: Pricing includes subscription tiers with additional usage-based fees for exceeding limits.
